sections.heading: care for disabled adults program; powers and duties of the department.

sections.heading: Rulemaking
sections.text: 410.606 Rulemaking.—The department shall adopt rules to implement ss. 410.601-410.606. The rules shall define each community service, establish minimum standards for the delivery of services, establish a fee schedule, and make other provisions necessary to implement ss. 410.601-410.606.

sections.heading: 410.601-410.606 may be cited as “The Community Care for Disabled Adults Act.”
sections.text: 410.601-410.606 may be cited as “The Community Care for Disabled Adults Act.”
